data.name: Case conversion and processing of string arrays based on conditions
data.description:
# Task

If ```number``` is a multiple of ```factor```, convert everything in ```array``` to lowercase, and vice convert to upercase, and output the processed (as we shall see later on) array as a string.

## Processing

* convert the first letter to uppercase(if all char is converted to lowercase) or lowercase(if all char is converted to uppercase).
* Insert "." at the end.
* Separate each array item with a space.

# Example

```javascript
convert(1,1,["hI","bJK","SjY"]): "Hi bjk sjy."
convert(9,3,["hEllo","COdeWar"]): "Hello codewar."
convert(3,2,["User","pAsSwOrD"]): "uSER PASSWORD."
```

# Write at end

Programmer, good luck!

If you like this kata,please give a favorable review,thanks.
